Description: Part of the blade of a bifacial knife: of dark grey flint, pressure flaked over the whole surface and retouched along the edge. Curved blade, broken at each end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Merneit, grave Y24 (subsidiary)
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XIV, group marked Y, 2nd from bottom.
